info.name: Order Managment System
info.description:
# Order managment System Apis

StartFragment

This collection contains the APIs for the Order Management System project. The APIs are structured into different modules to handle specific functionalities.

1. Customers:
    - Responsible for CRUD operations related to customers.
2. Orders:
    - Handles CRUD operations for managing orders.
3. Products:
    - Manages CRUD operations for products.
4. Product-Order:
    - Manages the linkage between orders and products.
5. Stocks:
    - Provides CRUD operations for managing product stocks.
6. User:
    - Enables system users to sign up or log in to obtain an authorization token.

Project Mapping:

- Customers: api/customers
- Orders: api/orders
- Products: api/products
- Product-Order: api/transaction
- Stocks: api/stocks
- User: api/user
    

Please note that the APIs mentioned above are organized based on their respective functionalities, ensuring a clear separation of concerns and ease of use.

This collection provides a comprehensive set of APIs to perform CRUD operations and manage various aspects of the Order Management System.

    "[/api/stock/{id}]": "WebServices.OrderManagement.Controller.StockController#GetStock(Long)",

    "[/api/product/{id}]": "WebServices.OrderManagement.Controller.ProductController#DeleteProduct(Long)",

    "[/api/customer/{id}]": "WebServices.OrderManagement.Controller.CustomerController#UpdateCustomer(Long, CustomerEntity)",
